Generate 50 high-quality flashcards using this schema: [INSERT flashcard_generation_schema HERE]. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards, each as: { "id": number, "type": "Basic Q&A|Cloze|MCQ", "front": string, "back": string (answer + explanation + 'Bloom: X | Layer: Y | SE Relevance: Yes/No (reason) | Active Link: Z'), "topic_hierarchy": "full path string", "phase": "PTES phase or N/A" }.
